.: Trama :.

AngÃƒÂ©lique (Audrey Tautou) purchases a single pink rose at a flower shop to be delivered to her lover, Dr. LoÃƒÂ¯c Le Garrec (Samuel Le Bihan). AngÃƒÂ©lique is a successful art student. In between creating her art projects, she works part-time at a cafe and house sits for a wealthy vacationing family. AngÃƒÂ©lique's friend David (ClÃƒÂ©ment Sibony) disapproves of AngÃƒÂ©lique's affair with LoÃƒÂ¯c, who is married, but AngÃƒÂ©lique insists that LoÃƒÂ¯c will leave his wife for her. When LoÃƒÂ¯c's wife, Rachel (Isabelle CarrÃƒÂ©), has a miscarriage, the pair separate and AngÃƒÂ©lique prepares to leave with LoÃƒÂ¯c on a romantic getaway to Florence, Italy. However, LoÃƒÂ¯c doesn't meet AngÃƒÂ©lique at the airport, having chosen to mend things with his wife. This throws AngÃƒÂ©lique into a self-destructive cycle of clinical depression, losing her job and scholarship. While watching the news one night, she learns that LoÃƒÂ¯c has been arrested for assaulting one of his patients, Sonia Jasmin (Nathalie Krebs). She goes to Sonia's house to convince her to drop the charges, and in the ensuing scuffle, Sonia has a heart attack and dies. AngÃƒÂ©lique steals from the house to make it look like a robbery. AngÃƒÂ©lique thinks this will win LoÃƒÂ¯c back, but instead he's arrested for Sonia's murder, and embraces his wife as he is dragged away. AngÃƒÂ©lique returns home, turns on the gas and lies down on the floor. At this point the film rewinds to the opening scene when AngÃƒÂ©lique bought the pink rose. This time the film follows the delivery boy and the subsequent events play out from LoÃƒÂ¯c's viewpoint.

Angelique (Audrey Tautou), una giovane studentessa, ÃƒÂ¨ innamorata di un dottore, Loic (Samuel Le Bihan) giÃƒÂ  sposato. Si assiste a tutti i tentativi fatti dalla ragazza affinchÃƒÂ© l'amante lasci la donna, in attesa di un bambino, che finiscono sempre per naufragare, compreso il viaggio a Firenze progettato dai due amanti. Alla fine il film "torna indietro", e si assiste alla stessa storia, vista perÃƒÂ² dal punto di vista del dottore, che evidentemente vede le attenzioni di Angelique sotto una luce diversa. TPB
